main event: Visual sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported at Barksdale AFB, Louisiana on August 8, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were reported to appear as intense white lights and were circular in shape., They were estimated to be at an altitude of 10,000 to 15,000 feet and moving at speeds in excess of 500 mph., The objects made abrupt stops and changes in direction but were not tracked by radar., Approximately 12 officers and airmen observed the objects., Witnesses described the sighting as lasting about 15 to 30 minutes.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects that appeared as intense white lights
witness description: officers and airmen at Barksdale AFB
